Text.Page: Why didn't all these monstrosities leave with the argons who made them? Is there a strategic reason? There's a wendigo somewhere around the {@Rgn:47012$$Argon Shield Emitter} who leads the pack. {@Creature:47#6001$$Erphisha}'s what they call him. See if he's carrying any orders.
So what did you find on him? Hey, this isn't orders!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"No, it's skin."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Skin! That's horrible!

I guess what's really horrible is the state of it. It's badly decomposed.

So he was already dead when you killed him....
